name: Sep's Diner
description:
Welcome to Sep’s Diner, the new burger restaurant of which YOU are the Chef! Will it really become the best burger in town? It’s up to you!

Level after level, your experience will increase as well as the number of your gourmet customers. They are in a hurry, so make it quick to satisfy them before they leave!

Hungry, they won't let you make a mistake, even though burger orders will become more and more complicated... Be attentive and precise, to make the best possible profit!

Game Features:

  • 12 levels included
  • Challenging but not impossible!
  • Choose your prefered navigation mode (teleport, smooth, roomscale)
  • Intense and thrilling levels
  • Immersive audio ambiance
  • Impatient customers with fun voices
  • Beautiful scenery and colored lights
  • Increasing difficulty level after level
  • More than 30 different combinations for burgers recipes!

Coming soon:

  • Multiplayer mode
  • Ultra mode
  • More levels
  • More recipes
  • New restaurants
  • More fun!
